root.name: Samurai Shodown 64: Warriors Rage
root.description: The follow up sequel Samurai Shodown 64, there are only a few note-worthy things about this game. Even though the game was in 3D, combat is essentially on a 2D-plane with foreground/background sidestepping. Warriors Rage is also where Asura first appeared in the Samurai Shodown franchise. As important as this game is to the storyline, it was never officially released in North America. However, Warriors Rage did get a sprite-based port to the Neo-Geo Pocket Color as Samurai Shodown! 2.
